_header: Yet I see but few can seek […Ȝutte y se but fewe canne sece]
_description: The Wheel of Fortune — eight cross-rhymed quatrains

BodDou78.First Lines:
…ȝutte y se but fewe canne secebut to þe whele in
                    haste þay doþe hye…
BodDou78.Last Lines:
…an to fle from euery sory chaunceOf fortune yefe þat
                    sche turne hur whele
BodDou78.Editions:
Williams,  Benjamin. 
             Chronicque de la Traison et Mort de Richart Deux Roy Dengleterre mis en
